attributes.action: Bring world leaders together monthly to tackle climate and environmental issues
attributes.additional_details: We need a monthly meeting of world leaders to agree urgent steps to address climate change; agree measures to cut down on fossil fuel use and increase use of renewable energy; and clean up plastic and other waste from our environment, including our countryside, parks, beaches and oceans. Please sign. One signature can go a long way. One tree can make a thousand matches. One match can destroy a million trees.
attributes.background: The UK Government should take a lead role in addressing global climate change and environmental issues by bringing world leaders together every month to agree urgent actions and monitor progress. I feel like the Government needs to do more. Everyone does.
